title: 4 Piece Luxurious 1000 Thread Count Cal King Size Goose Down Alternative Comforter Set 100% Egyptian Cotton, Black Solid Color, 1000 TC - 750FP - 50Oz.

3pc Black Solid Duvet Set has 1 Duvet Cover & 2 Pillow Shams, 1000TC 100% Egyptian Cotton

description: This is a EGYPTIAN COTTON FACTORY OUTLET STORE brand product. THIS IS A HARD TO FIND COMBINATION!! We bring the beauty and style of generations of craftsmanship directly to your home. 4 Piece package contains 1 Goose Down Alternative Comforter, 1 Duvet Cover and 2 Pillow Shams in a beautiful zippered package. Luxury goose down-alternative comforter provides medium warmth for year-round, filling with 750+ Fill power, 50 oz, 100% Goose Down Alternative. 1000TC Egyptian-Cotton Cover. Hypo-allergenic. Box-stitching design to avoid any shifting in your comforter and for the Maximum warmth. 3pc Duvet Set is luxurious 1000 thread count 100% Egyptian Cotton. Duvet cover made with buttons at footer & slip over the comforter creating LUXURIOUS look & color. The result is a comforter so luxurious and soft, you will believe you are truly covering with a cloud, night after night. You will relax and enjoy the rich, soft and luxurious cotton cover comforter. Warranty only when purchased from EGYPTIAN COTTON FACTORY OUTLET STORE brand Reseller.
